title: Connecting The Physical And Digital Worlds
subtitle: IoTeX is a secure, scalable, and EVM-compatible blockchain platform for real world DApps & digital assets
subtitle2: IoTeX is the first blockchain platform to make real world data available for Dapps. Enjoy a full-stack developer experience with instant finality and ultra-low fees.

title3: A Launchpad for Next-gen Dapps & Assets

subtitle4: IoTeX is more than just a blockchain -- it is a full-stack platform to enable trusted data from trusted devices for use in trusted DApps.

subtitle5: The IoTeX Network is fueled by the native IOTX token. IoTeX stakeholders can spend, stake, and/or burn IOTX in order to access network resources.
